name: Bring Me Home
description:
bring me home is a game about a small creature that is lost and you need to help it get home. the creature can work together with other creatures to become stronger.

 
there are 12 levels. the goal is that you bring the creature to the door of the house. if you do that then you completed a level of the game.

this game is made as a game for the brackeys game jam 2021.1. the theme was Stronger together.

Controles

  • left = A
  • right = D
  • Jump = W
  • Shooting = spacebar
